Metadata.Title: You Subscribed to Router Vendor's Security Notification Service
Metadata.DirectLink: You Subscribed to Router Vendor's Security Notification Service

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that router vendor's security notification service is subscribed to reduce the attack surface area.

How to Check

On a deployed router, every open port is associated with a listening service. To reduce the attack surface area, default services that are not required should be shut down. Examples include bootps and Finger, which are rarely required. You should also scan your router to detect which ports are open.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
